title: Looking for any rank support
body:
Learning ADC role for the purpose of PvP and Ranked.

Currently Bronze 5 as i'm billy no mates and solo queue is a nightmare. I feel a little like a yoyo atm, up to B4 then back to B5 up to B4 etc ect.
Not saying that the reason i'm stuck in bronze is purely because of trolls/flamers but it is a big contribution to it at the end of the day.

I currently play:

Mid:
 {{champion:99}} 

Jungle:
 {{champion:56}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:421}} 

Top:
 {{champion:92}} {{champion:17}} 

Support: 
{{champion:89}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:53}} 

ADC:
Nothing workable atm (Will play {{champion:222}} {{champion:22}}  if i absolutely have to play ADC)

Looking for a good supporter main or part timer to assist in the development of my {{champion:429}}  ADC.
I'm a casual gamer here on LoL so nothing too serious, just a bit of fun.
I Have Curse Comms and welcome any mature gamer, I'm 28 so prefer team mates around my own age.

Thanks in advance, see you on the Rift.

~ Sgt Major

replies.body: hey man sent u a friend request keen to duo support main from s3 im 31 with voice from brisbane

We may have been made for each other.

I'll add you on my Bronze Smurf. I'm 30yo Plat ADC main, and would like the chance to practice my other roles in a 'no pressure' environment.
